entry.descr: modifies list value at specified position, filtering it via external object.
entry.name: list.apply_to

entry.descr: checks if input data has *any* type
entry.name: is_any

entry.descr: checks if input data has *bang* type
entry.name: is_bang

entry.descr: checks if input number is even
entry.name: is_even

entry.descr: checks if input data has *float* type
entry.name: is_float

entry.descr: checks if input data has *list* type
entry.name: is_list

entry.descr: checks if input data has *symbol* type
entry.name: is_symbol

entry.descr: returns the size of physical memory (RAM) in bytes round to float data type.
entry.name: system.memsize

entry.descr: returns the process physical memory use - current and peak
entry.name: system.memused
